basics.name: Besat Kassaie
basics.label: Postdoctoral Researcher
basics.summary: I am involved in research focused on data intelligence and data lakes. I assist with the drafting of grant proposals and academic papers.

work.name: The Cheriton School of Computer Science, University of Waterloo
work.summary: Research focused on data intelligence and data lakes.

work.name: The Cheriton School of Computer Science, University of Waterloo
work.summary: Served as a co-investigator on the math retrieval project, devising effective queries from texts containing mathematical formulas and content.

work.name: Innovation Lab, University of Waterloo
work.summary: Developed a platform that searches documents with text and mathematical content using a pen-based interface.

work.name: The Cheriton School of Computer Science, University of Waterloo
work.position: Graduate Teaching Assistant & Graduate Research Assistant
work.summary: Assisted in multiple undergraduate courses in Data Structures & Algorithms, Database Systems, and Introduction to Computer Science.

work.name: AGENCY FOR SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND RESEARCH (A*STAR), Singapore
work.summary: Developed a machine-learning-based approach to design a sleep quality assessment tool for McLaren.

interests.name: Applied Machine Learning
keywords: Large Language Models for Data Systems

projects.name: Differential Maintenance Engine (DME)
projects.description: DME identifies documents' updates that can be autonomously applied on extracted relations.
highlights: Conducted experiments published in the VLDB journal.

projects.name: Updatable Views Verifier (U2V)
projects.description: U2V assesses the updatability of an extracted view presented as a JAPE program.

projects.name: Iterative Query Refinement System (IQRef)
projects.description: An alternative approach to active learning for expert-in-the-loop cohort identification.

projects.name: Math-Aware Search Engine
projects.description: Search and retrieve documents including mathematical content for given math formulas and terms.
highlights: Implemented features of the search engine, conducted study of proximity signals, created proximity re-ranking run.
